long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embrace the toxic mastery of Viper from Valorant with this striking live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek and tactical interface inspired by Viper’s poison-filled strategies and precise control.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that complements Viper’s tactical and calculated approach.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Immerse yourself in Valorant-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as strategic and impactful as Viper’s abilities.
